Instruction: Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a 9-inch round cast iron skillet or baking pan.
Mix together the flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, raisins, and caraway seeds in a large bowl.

Mix the dry ingredients, add the wet ingredients until just moistened, knead the dough lightly in the bowl, then transfer it into the greased skillet or pan, pressing down gently. Score the top of the dough, and sprinkle with reserved flour.
Bake in the oven for 65 to 75 minutes. Allow the bread to cool, then transfer it onto a wire rack.
